name: DMishal Turnkey Services Pvt Ltd

idea:
Bettr is a start-up in the retail distribution space. We have developed a new innovative model for distribution of financial services and products through an assisted digital journey empowering our distribution partners to on-board customers for these products. We are identifying latent capacity to generate part time employment across different people (for instance, retail store operators, housewives, students, etc.) by providing opportunities to these people to earn income by distributing financial services products of various banks and financial institutions. We have partnered with multiple banks, NBFCs and insurance companies to sell their products and offerings through our platform.

Founded in 2019, the company has raised a seed round from marque private equity investors. It's led by a passionate team comprising of alumni from IITs & IIMs with leadership experience at organizations like Deutsche Bank AG, McKinsey & Company, American Express, Lehman Brothers, Myntra, Housing.com and ICICI Bank.
name: MVALU TECHNOLOGY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Sattvajiv Foods India Private Limited is FMCG Industry primarily producing greek yogurt brand "Theogurt". Theogurt is the greek yogurt with high protein, high fiber, antioxidants with some delicious veggies flavours like broccoli, kale, spinach and pain.

We are currently operating in Mumbai (Online + Offline).
name: Theogurt

idea:
SneakUp is an online sneaker marketplace where people can buy sell

and auction sneakers in India.


The price of the shoes is decided based on the international value, story,

the number of pairs available in the market, demand, and sales globally.

The Indian sneaker market is slowly growing and more and more people

are becoming interested in having high priced sneakers as collectibles and

collecting sneakers as a hobby.

We plan to be the flag bearers of the Indian sneaker resale market and get

the first mover’s advantage. We have resold sneakers in the past and see a

huge potential in this untapped market.

Our website needs funds for developing the technology for building such an

online marketplace and that is all that is keeping us from launching.
name: SneakUp

idea:
Remember back when restaurants used to personalize their music selection to their customer’s experience? Neither do we.

That’s the point though. We just wanted to do something about the agony of sitting through randomly selected songs playing on repeat in eateries or the horror of listening to ‘Hips Don’t Lie’ over lunch at the local café (btw, we love the song but it’s best left in 2005 where it belongs)
name: BE THE CHANGE MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We were incorporated in November 2017, we are an organization focused on assisting organization to improve process and enhance margins for our customers.

- Process Improvements (SOP, Process Improvement etc…)

- Internal Audits

- Cost Take Analytics, Margin Improvement programs.

- Call Center analytics – Assisting in Call to Conversion ratio ( leveraging our software using R / Python)

- Zero Shrinkage – Retail and Stock , Warehouse & Asset Audits

- Reconciliation services

- BI & AI.
name: ARBHAR CONSULTING PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Trixter Cyber Solutions is a cyber security agency that specialises in incident response, digital forensics and cyber risk assessments for IT environments.


We aim to become one of the leading and trusted partner for incident response for businesses and enterprises globally.


Our catalogue of services has three main pillars:

1. Cyber Incident Response and Incident Response Centre - A SOC service catered for incident response.


2. Cyber Risk Assessments and Incident Response Readiness programme - assessments and programmes build to help the business understand their risk exposure, risk appetite and determine the GAP in their incident response capabilities.


3. Risk Mitigation Programme - Mitigation is a key factor and we will work with businesses to help them understand how to mitigate cyber risk and assist them in implementing security solutions in their environment.


We work in collaboration with the business and provide them with a holistic view on how to approach cyber risk whilst they are on a digital transformation journey.
name: TRIXTER CYBER SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
